document.heading: Health Benefit Exchange Authority Establishment Act of 2011

history.narrative: Law 19-94, the “Health Benefit Exchange Authority Establishment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-2, which was referred to the Committee on Health, Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2012, and December 20, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 17, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-269 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-94 became effective on March 2, 2012.
